sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Download Loader here: https://gofile.io/d/VwJt9z
Video Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hnanB1exR10
If you run into any issues, run our support tool & make everythin green: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ
DO STEPS IN ORDER AND DO NOT SKIP ANYTHING

If you have issues throughout the process, make a ticket explaining your issue in detail on the discord

sections.title: Before You Start
sections.text:
Before you start, make sure all Anti-Virus is disabled. If you are on Windows 11, open Core Isolation (Windows Search) and turn everything off and restart your PC.

The cheat only works on a specific version of rust, therefore RustLoader is needed to run the cheat! (REQUIRED)

sections.title: Downloading and Running RustLoader
sections.text:
Download RustLoader files: https://mega.nz/file/A7ljHRBQ#9_CbgIOVXdSAGbp9yVagKOyTEno3hdYt-0EtoHsPb3Q

This downloads a .rar file and can only be opened with WinRAR

Link to WinRAR: https://www.win-rar.com/postdownload.html?&L=0

Open the Rust.rar file and drag DepotDownloader.exe and RustLoader.exe to desktop

Once they are on your desktop, run RustLoader.exe

A console will open, that will now download the specific version of rust.

It will download this rust version to a folder called "rust_download".

This will take a while, so please be patient.

If you get "chunk download error", just let it keep running, it's not an issue.

Once it is finished it will say "Press Enter to launch Rust.exe...", however do not do this yet. Close the console!

sections.title: Downloading and Injecting the Cheat Loader
sections.text:
Next step: Download the cheat loader: https://gofile.io/d/7wUmvs

Put this file anywhere you want.

Next open it and press "2" to register an account.

Enter username, password & license key.

Next press "1" to "Use a cheat"

Select a cheat by typing the number.

It will now say "Streaming (Cheat name)..."

Will take 1-2 minutes.

Once everthing is finished it will say "Injection Queued!" and close itself after.

sections.title: Launching Rust and Troubleshooting
sections.text:
Next step (IMPORTANT)

It is important that you never launch Rust from steam (It will crash)

Go to your rust_download folder and open Rust.exe (NOT RustClient.exe)

Cheat will load in the main menu - Menu key: Insert

If you cannot see any servers, connect via console (Typically F1 key)

Find servers here: https://www.battlemetrics.com/servers/rust

If you crash while loading, inject again with loader and try again, if it keeps not working, then the server is not supported atm.
